tabPanel.main_subtitle: Our on-chain solutions avoid traditional payment rails that carry high FX and other transaction fees. In short, we leverage blockchain networks and other non-traditional rails for more cost-effective settlement

checkBox.textSpan: Fewer correspondent and intermediary banks mean lower fees
Access to a least-cost routing AI/ML algorithm to optimally select payment route via our multi-chain network

tabPanel.main_subtitle: Both our on- and off-chain solutions leverage nimble systems to settle payments in nearly real-time

checkBox.textSpan: Blockchain-enabled payments are inherently faster, avoiding cumbersome traditional intermediaries
Money and payment metadata flow over the same systems, ensuring faster settlement
For off-chain solutions, we leverage blockchain to route payment metadata faster
